dmca.title: Protraderforex Claims Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
We are requesting action to be taken under the Digital Millenium Copyright Act. I am the owner of the site http://protraderforex.com and our product is Conquest.  Conquest is a piece of software that trades the forex market for you and sells for $995 on our site. 

A website called http://mq4-expert-advisors.by.ru is directly copying and using our copyright and our trademark. This site is offering for sale our software using our intellectual property and our trademark. It is a blatant infringement and should be removed immediately and the IP address banned from google. This site is using the copyright and the trademark of more than a dozen commercially sold expert advisor software not just our software. It is making a mockery of Google and our intellectual property. 

The infringing URL
